      private boolean verifica​(int d, int m, int a)
      function that checks if a date is valid
      Parameters:
      d - -> day
      m - -> month
      a - -> year
      Returns:

    • comparaDatas

      public boolean comparaDatas​(Data dataMenor, Data dataMaior)
      function that checks if one date is before another
      Parameters:
      dataMenor - -> date that should be older than the other
      dataMaior - -> date that should be more recent than the other
      Returns:
      true or false
